name: Kuro Tactics
description:
Kuro Tactics is a unique Turn Based Strategy RPG with Grid Movement that was inspired by Game Boy Advance favorites!

Features an advanced algorithm for generating enemy unit stats which yields for replayable chapters & will keep the wittiest of players on their toes.

Enjoy that nostalgic style of game play, with controls optimized for speed.

Each unique campaign map is hand crafted to insure a worthy challenging experience.

There are many ways to strengthen your allies: Leveling, Weapons, Gear & Artifacts. Take your characters to greater challenges as you battle for victory!
